short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to share the current page you are viewing with your WhatsApp contacts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you want to quickly share the link to the page you are viewing in chrome, click on this extension and it will use WhatsApp's Web app to share with your contacts. This extension requires you to pair your chrome browser with WhatsApps Web App. This extension does not ask, store, or use any information. It activates WhatsApp's Web App.
